DOC.brief_summary: The project goal conduct randomize control trial ( RCT ) test whether mobile phone short message system ( SMS ) reminder , either without mobile-phone base travel subsidy improve timeliness , coverage , drop-out rate routine EPI vaccine rural western Kenya .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Impact Mobile Phone Delivered Reminders Travel Subsidies Improve Childhood Immunization Coverage Rates Timeliness Western Kenya
DOC.criteria: 1 . Mother infant age 04 week study period 2 . Current resident one study villages 3 . Willing sign inform consent study 1 . Plans move study area next 6 month 2 . Resides village active immunization intervention/program 3 . Has already receive immunization birth dose BCG polio
